title: Natural ingredients in Ayurveda which help our body to heal from within - Times of India
author: Shikha Desai
description: Here's how to use some of the natural ingredients in order to keep your immunity strong
cleaned_text: most important [natural](https://www.speakingtree.in/topics/nature/natural) ingredient and is like a neutral medium. It takes up the properties of whatever we infuse it with. With ginger it helps in digestion with its heat properties and with cardamom it is cooling yet aiding digestion. Try and use water wisely. Coconut oil - The best thing is to have it early morning with a pinch of pepper in it empty stomach. Pepper - Helps in digestion and absorption of food. It is the most useful natural ingredient available to keep our metabolism going in the right directionAloe Vera- It's cooling nature has healing properties and good antioxidants. Ginger - Best natural ingredient to improve immunity. Consume it with jaggery and pinch of pepper. Coriander seeds- Helps to cool the [body](https://www.speakingtree.in/topics/health/body) but yet keeps up with the metabolism of the body.Cumin seeds- Digestive and carminative. Turmeric - Helps to build good immunity by helping cells to regulate their energy flow. Betel leaf- Helps in digestion. Inputs by Dr Onkar Rajiv Bilgi, Co-founder We R Wellness
